title: november 1: the rating game
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia goes R rated—in a manner of speaking. Though her content doesn’t get explicit, she does talk about how the Motion Picture Association of America developed its current rating system. Then, she explains the nitty gritty of a Swift lawsuit—Taylor Swift, that is. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
